meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6067.

td.p: Carrie Oken, a TV lighting technician from New York, New York
Ali Binazir, an author and hypnotherapist from Santa Monica, California
Anthony Fox, an account executive from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $39,399)

tr.td: ITS LONGEST BORDER
(Alex: You identify the country next to the one we mention.)
THE CINEMA
BURGER JOINTS
THE GARMENT DISTRICT
"Y" ASK
TEAM JACOB
